StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetFlightPhysicalData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@MarineCandidateID int, @ExamDate date.me AS
SELECT COALESCE(FP.EXAM_PURPOSE_ID, SPACE(0)) AS EXAM_PURPOSE_ID, COALESCE(FP.EXAM_TAKEN_AT, SPACE(0)) AS EXAM_TAKEN_AT, COALESCE(FP.HEIGHT, 0) AS HEIGHT, COALESCE(FP.WEIGHT, 0) AS WEIGHT, COALESCE(FP.RIGHT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, SPACE(0)) AS RIGHT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, COALESCE(FP.LEFT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, SPACE(0)) AS LEFT_UNCORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, COALESCE(FP.RIGHT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, SPACE(0)) AS RIGHT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, COALESCE(FP.LEFT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, SPACE(0)) AS LEFT_CORR_VISUAL_ACUITY, COALESCE(FP.VISUAL_COLOR, SPACE(0)) AS VISUAL_COLOR, COALESCE(FP.VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION, SPACE(0)) AS VISUAL_COLOR_DISPOSITION, COALESCE(FP.CYCLOPLEGIC, SPACE(0)) AS CYCLOPLEGIC, COALESCE(FP.CONTACT_LENSES, SPACE(0)) AS CONTACT_LENSES, COALESCE(FP.CHEST_XRAY, SPACE(0)) AS CHEST_XRAY, COALESCE(FP.EKG, SPACE(0)) AS EKG, COALESCE(FP.DENTAL_CLASS_ID, 0) AS DENTAL_CLASS_ID, COALESCE(FP.SITTING_POSITION, 0.0) AS SITTING_POSITION, COALESCE(FP.BUTTOCK_LEG_LENGTH, 0) AS BUTTOCK_LEG_LENGTH, COALESCE(FP.BUTTOCK_KNEE_LENGTH, 0) AS BUTTOCK_KNEE_LENGTH, COALESCE(FP.FUNCTIONAL_REACH, 0) AS FUNCTIONAL_REACH, COALESCE(FP.MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_ID, 0) AS MEDICAL_DISPOSITION_ID, COALESCE(FP.CONSULTATION_TYPE, SPACE(0)) AS CONSULTATION_TYPE, COALESCE(FP.BUMED_DETERMINATION_ID, 0) AS BUMED_DETERMINATION_ID FROM FLIGHT_PHYSICAL FP WHERE FP.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @MarineCandidateID AND FP.EXAM_DATE = @ExamDate
